name: AutoFilterV2bot
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @Api_HelperBot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @Api_HelperBot

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCESUB_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your forcesubscribe channel USERNAME (without @)..

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From @PyrogramStringBot

ADMINS.description: A space separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can only create links
